name: Average Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA)  WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.result = 'SUCCESS' RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInteger(n.duration)),0) as avgOutput

name: Total Number of Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} RETURN count(distinct n.buildNumber) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Successful Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.result='SUCCESS' RETURN  count(distinct n.buildNumber) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Number of Failed Builds
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.result='FAILURE' RETURN count(distinct n.buildNumber) as TotalNumberBuild

name: Maximum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime}  and n.result='SUCCESS' RETURN COALESCE(Max(toInteger(n.duration)),0) as MaxBuildTime

name: Minimum Build Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JENKINS:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and  n.result='SUCCESS' RETURN  COALESCE(Min(toInteger(n.duration)),0) as MinBuildTime

name: Average Duration of Succesful Deployments
DBQuery: MATCH (n:XLRELEASE:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.releaseStatus='Success' RETURN (avg((n.releaseEndDateEpoch-n.releaseStartDateEpoch))/1000) as averageDeploymentDuration

name: Total Failed Deployments
DBQuery: MATCH (n:XLRELEASE:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} AND n.releaseStatus='Failed' RETURN count(n.status) as totalDeploymentCount

name: Maximum Deployment Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:XLRELEASE:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.releaseStatus='Success' RETURN (max((n.releaseEndDateEpoch-n.releaseStartDateEpoch))/1000) as MaxDeploymentTime

name: Total Successful Deployments
DBQuery: MATCH (n:XLRELEASE:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.releaseStatus='Success' RETURN count(n.releaseStatus) as totalDeploymentCount

name: Minimum Deployment Time
DBQuery: MATCH (n:XLRELEASE:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.releaseStatus='Success' RETURN (min((n.releaseEndDateEpoch-n.releaseStartDateEpoch))/1000) as MinDeploymentTime

name: Average Complexity
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='OK' RETURN  COALESCE(round(Avg(toInteger(n.sonarComplexity))),0) as AvgComplexityCoverage

name: Average Duplicated Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='OK' RETURN  COALESCE(Avg(toInteger(n.sonarDuplicateCode)),0) as AvgDuplicateBlocksCoverage

name: Number of Quality Passed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='OK' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks

name: Number of Quality Failed Blocks
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='ERROR' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfQualityBlocks

name: Average Code Coverage
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='OK' RETURN  COALESCE(Avg(toInteger(n.code_coverage)),0) as AvgCodeCoverage

name: Number of Successful Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='OK' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions

name: Number of Failed Sonar Executions
DBQuery: MATCH (n:SONAR:DATA) where n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.alert_status='ERROR' RETURN count(n) as NumberOfSonarExecutions

name: Number of Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.issueType='Bug' RETURN count(n) as totalDefect

name: Number of Closed Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.issueType='Bug' and n.status='Done'  RETURN count(n) as ClosedDefect

name: Number of Open Defects
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.issueType='Bug' and not(n.status='Done')  RETURN count(n) as OpenDefect

name: Average Defect Duration
DBQuery: MATCH (n:JIRA:DATA) WHERE n.inSightsTime>= {startTime} and n.inSightsTime<= {endTime} and n.issueType='Bug' and n.status='Done'  RETURN COALESCE(Avg(toInteger(n.timeSpent)),0) as AvgDefectCompletionTime
